name: CS Oat Pecan Cookies txt
---
1 stick / 113 grams butter
;brown, add to mixer

1 stick / 113 grams butter, cold
;add  to mixer with hot brown butter
;let cool

75 cups / 150 grams brown sugar
5 cups / 100 grams sugar
;add to butters, cream

2 large / 100 grams eggs, cold
1 tbsp / 13 grams vanilla extract
;add to sugar/butter, mix

0.5 recipe CS Pecan Brittle
1 cup / 100 grams oats
1.3 cup / 173 grams flour
2 tsp / 6 grams salt
1 tsp / 6 grams baking soda
;food processor until combined
;add to mixer

0.5 recipe / 100 grams CS Pecan Brittle
1 cup / 100 grams oats
;add to mixer

;roll out cookies, feeze for hours

;bake at 350F
